# 🚀 Pull Request Template 
## 📄 Description
<!-------------- INSTRUCTIONS --------------
Briefly describe the changes proposed in this pull request. Include context behind these changes that will help reviewers understand the purpose and impact of the changes.
------------------------------------------->
This PR will introduce the following:
* 🍉 major changes:
    * <insert_major_change_1>
    * <insert_major_change_2>
    * <insert_major_change...>
    * <insert_major_change_n>
* 🍇 minor changes:
    * <insert_minor_change_1>
    * <insert_minor_change_2>
    * <insert_minor_change...>
    * <insert_minor_change_n>

## 🔄 Type of change
<!-------------- INSTRUCTIONS --------------
Mark all checkboxes that apply with an `x`
(e.g. `[ ]` becomes `[x]`)
------------------------------------------->
- [ ] 📚 Documentation, examples, tutorials, dependencies update
- [ ] 🐛 Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] 🥂 Improvement (non-breaking change which improves an existing feature)
- [ ] ✨ New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] 💥 Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)
- [ ] 🔐 Security fix
- [ ] 🔍 Other (Please describe)

## ✅ Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have updated documentation (e.g. README.md, comments in code)
- [ ] I have reviewed my code changes
- [ ] I have tested my code changes and added necessary tests
